properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Hazardous Seas Warning issued January 9 at 2:14PM PST until January 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, south winds 30 to 40 kt with gusts
up to 50 kt and seas 12 to 17 feet at 10 seconds expected. For
the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous seas 22 to
27 feet at 16 seconds expected.

* WHERE...All areas.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 10 PM PST Friday.
For the Hazardous Seas Warning, from 10 PM Friday to 4 AM PST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid strong winds and very steep
seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or
secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 10 PM PST FRIDAY... ...HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY
